content.content: Following the work on EIP-5805, we decided to spin off the clock part as its own EIP   github.com/ethereum/EIPs         Contract clock   ethereum:master ← Amxx:clock              opened 12:42PM - 25 Jan 23 UTC                 Amxx               +88 -0
content.GPT-summary: The post introduces EIP-6372, which is a spin-off of the clock part of EIP-5805. The author is explaining the proposal and providing a link to the GitHub page. There is no explicit request for feedback or collaboration, but positive feedback and constructive criticism are welcome. The post could also be seen as an announcement or advertisement for the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
